summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 13 requirements for a mobile-first, single-page astrology remedy guide landing page. All sections are present with the specified content, styling follows the white background/gold accents/black text color scheme, and the page structure is optimized for conversion. All trust badges, pricing, FAQ content, and CTA elements match the BuildRequest specifications.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Footer component with caffeine.ai attribution link
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer component with external attribution link was not requested in BuildRequest. While it does not harm the conversion flow, it was not part of the specified requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Implementation includes dark mode color scheme definitions
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified only white background, gold accents, and black text with no mention of dark mode support. The index.css file includes complete .dark theme definitions that were not requested.
